title: Ladysmith Black Mambazo - The Chillout Sessions [FLAC]
description:
The voices of Ladysmith Black Mambazo embody soul and spirituality. This album is the first time that their cappella singing has been re-mixed with beats. The result is songs which retain the essence of the group yet enhance and embellish everything that symbolises Ladysmith Black Mambazo.

01] The Wonder of This World [Soul Drummers Mix] 8.03
02] The Wonder of the Hammerhead Bird [Soul Drummers Mix] 4.02
03] Why Aren't You Happy? [Mama Groove Mix] 5.23
04] Star and the Wiseman [Lion King's Cross Mix] 7.15
05] Behold My Heart [Soul Drummers Mix] 3.47
06] Preserve South Africa's Culture [Soul Drummers Mix] 4.46
07] Let's Sit Down and Negotiate [Dumi Dhlamini Mix] 3.40
08] Everyone Enjoy [Nu-Life Mix] 4.37
09] Seascape 2 [Instrumental] 4.48
10] Wondariddim [Instrumental] 8.04
